name: Alien Ball
description:
Objective: Pick a side and knock the alien dude into the post to score points. Online Multiplayer

(Still Very Much A Work In Progress)

Developed by Bruce Rick and Tyler Marriott for the Little People Game Jam!

Controls:

Arrows: Movement

Space: Jump

Right Alt: Attack/Push the ball (work in progress)

Art assets are unity defaults or from this public sprite pack http://opengameart.org/content/platformer-art-delu.... (thanks Kenny!)
